[node:root$
response:_$
words:root$
priority:-1$
connections:what, exit, edit, open, read, search$]

[node:exit$
words:goodbye quit exit$
response:Exit Code 0$
priority:0$
connections:_$]

[node:what$
response:_$
words:what$
priority:0$
connections:time, date$]

[node:search$
response:search_mode{}$
words:search$
priority:0$
connections:specfic$]

[node:open$
response:_$
words:open$
priority:0$
connections:planner, spec_database$]

[node:read$
response:_$
words:read$
priority:0$
connections:_$]

[node:edit$
words:edit change modify update$
response:_$
priority:0$
connections:presets$]

[node:planner$
response:open_app{"Applications/Planner/Planner"}$
words:planner$
priority:1$
connections:_$]

[node:specfic$
response:spec_fic_search{}$
words:speculative$
priority:1$
connections:_$]


[node:spec_database$
response:open_app{"Applications/Database"}$
words:speculative$
priority:1$
connections:_$]

[node:time$
response:get_time{%H:%M}$
words:time$
priority:1$
connections:_$]

[node:date$
response:get_date{0}$
words:date$
priority:1$
connections:date_tomorrow, date_yesterday$]

[node:date_tomorrow$
response:get_date{1}$
words:tomorrow$
priority:2$
connections:_$]

[node:date_yesterday$
response:get_date{-1}$
words:yesterday$
priority:2$
connections:_$]

[node:presets$
words:presets settings$
response:change_presets{}$
priority:1$
connections:_$]
